attributes.title: The worst
attributes.review: this is the worst app ever -81737437283828/10 would never recommend to anyone in life

attributes.title: ✨no thanks bunker bitch✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app hoping I could gain some information on that orange guy in our White House, who can’t read. Unfortunately, once I created an account, I was immediately sent death threats from the app itself🤬 I was completely shocked when I then saw that the app only contained information proving how disgusting, self centered, ignorant, racist, sexist and every other -ist adjective and noun he is🤭😳🤡 I seriously would not recommend purchasing this app especially since I also received voice memos from bunker boy’s team calling me stupid and ugly🤧😤 very not cool😡Not only did I receive death threats and mean insults, I also got messages from the app in a very odd language that I believe to be an alien language👽👽😱 So now, not only do I fear for my life and am very hurt by the insults, I fear I may be ABDUCTED by ALIENS ‼️DO NOT BUY THIS APP UNDER ANY CIRCUMSTANCES ‼️

attributes.title: TRASH
attributes.review: So I downloaded the app in hopes to see WHAT trump would do in his election and stuff..BUT THE APP IS GARBAGE!! Seriously whenever I opened the app, my phone would crash back to back and it would kick me out of the application. Not only that but I heard that if I downloaded the app, I would gain Captain Price on MW but I’m still currently sitting in the Gulag. Like bro c’mon why you gotta lie. ALSO add me on Xbox 😂 Enragedswing280 😂

attributes.title: tiktok forvever🍾
attributes.review: okay so i'm not apart of gen z but i do believe everything that are is amazing, we can't have tiktok banned is gives joy to some us of who truely don't have it but we need to have it because what would be the world without, nothing, some of us won't get to see our favorite creators and all those videos on there will be a waste of time for some of who've been there since musical.ly!

attributes.title: Jah 👁👄👁
attributes.review: Ok this app is actually bad. I read the reviews and did not believe them so I tried it out myself. And come to find out that it was all true and now I have to get a whole new iPhone. As I’m writing this I keep getting kicked out of the App Store and my phone is turning off and on by itself. If you are reading this review please just save yourself time and money and DONT download this i’m sorry to say but this app is bad and is filled with all sorts of viruses! Mr.Orange let us down on this one 😭😢 as he always does. And yeah this review is the truth and only the truth! I have this an honest review!

attributes.title: It almost killed my cat
attributes.review: Ok so this app almost killed my cat i got this app to get free tickets for a concert because on a youtube ad it said it will give me free tickets , which it did NOT 😡 so ya i was angry then my cat almost got killed because for some reason there was a big fat cheeto on the screen ompa loopa thing and it was so ugly my cat was so scared!! i hate this app i want free tickets !!😡😡😡 oh and it’s telling me to vote for a rapist racist homophobic man! no way.

attributes.title: Poor quality
attributes.review: This app kept crashing. The content was not compatible with an iPhone or Android. Honestly don’t even know why they made this app if it doesn’t work. Trump doesn’t work either so I guess him and this app have something in common.
